languages.text: "Но все изменилось, когда я подобрала свой ключ к этой тайне. Видите ли, всю свою жизнь я скрашивала редкие минуты свободного времени живописью — если вы помните, в моих палатах была мастерская. Стоило мне представить варп в виде пустого холста, как меня захлестнуло неописуемое чувство... я водила кистью, погружаясь все глубже в собственную картину. В переливах красок мне мерещились образы — и что-то внутри подсказывало, на какой стоит откликнуться, а который оставить позади. Я очнулась спустя несколько дней — когда переход был благополучно завершен".

traits.locale_text: "Подавленная множеством неудач, я решила разбавить тоску перерывом на живопись — и неописуемое чувство захлестнуло меня... Я водила кистью по холсту, погружаясь все глубже в собственную картину... В переливах красок мне мерещились образы — и что-то внутри подсказывало, на какой стоит откликнуться, а который оставить позади. Я очнулась спустя несколько дней — регент Ааронто возбужденно тряс меня за плечо — и я поняла, что справилась".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "But everything changed when I found my own key to this mystery. You see, I've always brightened up my rare moments of leisure time by painting — you may recall there was a workshop in my chambers. As soon as I imagined the warp as a blank canvas, an indescribable feeling came over me... I moved the brush, going deeper and deeper into my own painting. Visions were hidden within the vibrant colours of my palette, and something inside me knew which should be brought out and which should be left behind. I woke up several days later, after the voyage was safely complete."
languages.original_text: "Но все изменилось, когда я подобрала свой ключ к этой тайне. Видите ли, всю свою жизнь я скрашивала редкие минуты свободного времени живописью — если вы помните, в моих палатах была мастерская. Стоило мне представить варп в виде пустого холста, как меня захлестнуло неописуемое чувство... я водила кистью, погружаясь все глубже в собственную картину. languages.text: “不过，当我找到了我自己的钥匙之后，一切都变了。如你所见，我难得闲暇的时候总是会画画。或许你还记得，我的房间里有间画室。每当我把亚空间想象成一块空白的画布时，我便会体会到某种难以描述的感觉……我会拿起画笔，进入我自己的画中，越走越深。那些幻景都隐藏在调色板鲜艳的色彩中，而我心中的某种东西，知道哪些色彩应该拿出来，哪些色彩应该留在原处。几天之后，航行会顺利结束，而我也会清醒过来。”
languages.original_text: "But everything changed when I found my own key to this mystery. You see, I've always brightened up my rare moments of leisure time by painting — you may recall there was a workshop in my chambers. As soon as I imagined the warp as a blank canvas, an indescribable feeling came over me... I moved the brush, going deeper and deeper into my own painting. Visions were hidden within the vibrant colours of my palette, and something inside me knew which should be brought out and which should be left behind. I woke up several days later, after the voyage was safely complete."

languages.original_text: "But everything changed when I found my own key to this mystery. You see, I've always brightened up my rare moments of leisure time by painting — you may recall there was a workshop in my chambers. As soon as I imagined the warp as a blank canvas, an indescribable feeling came over me... I moved the brush, going deeper and deeper into my own painting. Visions were hidden within the vibrant colours of my palette, and something inside me knew which should be brought out and which should be left behind. I woke up several days later, after the voyage was safely complete."

languages.text: «Pero todo cambió cuando encontré mi propia clave para el misterio. Verá, siempre he animado mis escasos momentos de ocio a través de la pintura. Tal vez recuerde el estudio en mis aposentos. En cuanto imaginé que la disformidad era un lienzo en blanco, sentí algo indescriptible... Moví el pincel adentrándome cada vez más en mi propio cuadro. Los vibrantes colores de mi paleta ocultaban visiones y algo en mi interior me decía cuáles revelar y cuales dejar tapadas. Desperté varios días más tarde con la travesía en buen puerto».
languages.original_text: "But everything changed when I found my own key to this mystery. You see, I've always brightened up my rare moments of leisure time by painting — you may recall there was a workshop in my chambers. As soon as I imagined the warp as a blank canvas, an indescribable feeling came over me... I moved the brush, going deeper and deeper into my own painting. Visions were hidden within the vibrant colours of my palette, and something inside me knew which should be brought out and which should be left behind. I woke up several days later, after the voyage was safely complete."

traits.locale_text: «Pero todo cambió cuando encontré mi propia clave para el misterio. Verá, siempre he animado mis escasos momentos de ocio a través de la pintura. Tal vez recuerde el estudio en mis aposentos. En cuanto imaginé que la disformidad era un lienzo en blanco, sentí algo indescriptible... Moví el pincel adentrándome cada vez más en mi propio cuadro. Los vibrantes colores de mi paleta ocultaban visiones y algo en mi interior me decía cuáles revelar y cuales dejar tapadas. Desperté varios días más tarde con la travesía en buen puerto».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ですが、この謎を解く自分なりの鍵を見つけたとき、すべてが変わったのです。私はいつも絵を描くことで、数少ない余暇の時間を明るくしてきました。私の部屋に作業場があったのを覚えているでしょうか。歪みを真っ白なキャンバスに見立てた瞬間、何とも言えない感情が私を襲ったのです…私は筆を動かし、自分の絵の中に深く深く入っていきました。パレットの鮮やかな色の中にビジョンが隠れていて、私の中の何かが、どれを引き出し、どれを残すべきかを知っていました。数日後、航海が無事に終わって目が覚めたのです」
languages.original_text: "But everything changed when I found my own key to this mystery. You see, I've always brightened up my rare moments of leisure time by painting — you may recall there was a workshop in my chambers. As soon as I imagined the warp as a blank canvas, an indescribable feeling came over me... I moved the brush, going deeper and deeper into my own painting. Visions were hidden within the vibrant colours of my palette, and something inside me knew which should be brought out and which should be left behind. I woke up several days later, after the voyage was safely complete."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが、この謎を解く自分なりの鍵を見つけたとき、すべてが変わったのです。私はいつも絵を描くことで、数少ない余暇の時間を明るくしてきました。私の部屋に作業場があったのを覚えているでしょうか。歪みを真っ白なキャンバスに見立てた瞬間、何とも言えない感情が私を襲ったのです…私は筆を動かし、自分の絵の中に深く深く入っていきました。パレットの鮮やかな色の中にビジョンが隠れていて、私の中の何かが、どれを引き出し、どれを残すべきかを知っていました。数日後、航海が無事に終わって目が覚めたのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Doch alles hat sich verändert, als ich meinen eigenen Schlüssel zu diesem Mysterium gefunden habe. Wisst Ihr, ich habe in meiner wenigen Freizeit schon immer gern gemalt — Ihr erinnert Euch vielleicht an das Atelier in meinen Gemächern. Sobald ich mir den Warp als leere Leinwand vorgestellt habe, hat mich ein unbeschreibliches Gefühl übermannt ... Ich habe den Pinsel bewegt, bin tiefer und tiefer in mein eigenes Gemälde vorgestoßen. In den strahlenden Farben meiner Palette waren Visionen verborgen, und irgendwie wusste ich, welche man herausholen und welche man zurücklassen sollte. Ich bin wenige Tage später erwacht, nach erfolgreichem Abschluss der Reise."
languages.original_text: "But everything changed when I found my own key to this mystery. You see, I've always brightened up my rare moments of leisure time by painting — you may recall there was a workshop in my chambers. As soon as I imagined the warp as a blank canvas, an indescribable feeling came over me... I moved the brush, going deeper and deeper into my own painting. Visions were hidden within the vibrant colours of my palette, and something inside me knew which should be brought out and which should be left behind. I woke up several days later, after the voyage was safely complete."

traits.locale_text: "Doch alles hat sich verändert, als ich meinen eigenen Schlüssel zu diesem Mysterium gefunden habe. Sobald ich mir den Warp als leere Leinwand vorgestellt habe, hat mich ein unbeschreibliches Gefühl übermannt ... Ich habe den Pinsel bewegt, bin tiefer und tiefer in mein eigenes Gemälde vorgestoßen. In den strahlenden Farben meiner Palette waren Visionen verborgen, und irgendwie wusste ich, welche man herausholen und welche man zurücklassen sollte. Ich bin wenige Tage später erwacht, nach erfolgreichem Abschluss der Reise."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Tout a changé quand j'ai trouvé moi-même la clé de ce mystère. J'ai toujours aimé peindre pendant mes rares moments libres, voyez-vous ; vous vous rappelez peut-être avoir vu un atelier dans mes quartiers. Dès que j'ai imaginé le Warp comme une toile vierge, une sensation indescriptible m'a envahie... J'ai laissé le pinceau courir et je me suis plongée de plus en plus profondément dans mon tableau. Les couleurs vives de ma palette dissimulaient des visions, et quelque chose en moi savait lesquelles utiliser et lesquelles ignorer. Lorsque je me suis réveillée quelques jours plus tard, le voyage était terminé et nous étions tous arrivés à bon port. »
languages.original_text: "But everything changed when I found my own key to this mystery. You see, I've always brightened up my rare moments of leisure time by painting — you may recall there was a workshop in my chambers. As soon as I imagined the warp as a blank canvas, an indescribable feeling came over me... I moved the brush, going deeper and deeper into my own painting. Visions were hidden within the vibrant colours of my palette, and something inside me knew which should be brought out and which should be left behind. I woke up several days later, after the voyage was safely complete."

traits.locale_text: « Tout a changé quand j'ai trouvé moi-même la clé de ce mystère. J'ai toujours aimé peindre pendant mes rares moments libres, voyez-vous ; vous vous rappelez peut-être avoir vu un atelier dans mes quartiers. Dès que j'ai imaginé le Warp comme une toile vierge, une sensation indescriptible m'a envahie... J'ai laissé le pinceau courir et je me suis plongée de plus en plus profondément dans mon tableau. Les couleurs vives de ma palette dissimulaient des visions, et quelque chose en moi savait lesquelles utiliser et lesquelles ignorer. Lorsque je me suis réveillée quelques jours plus tard, le voyage était terminé et nous étions tous arrivés à bon port. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu gizem karşısında kendi yaklaşımımı keşfedince işler değişti. Şöyle ki... Nadiren de olsa boş vaktim olduğunda ressamlığa soyunmuşumdur hep. Hatırlarsan odamda bir atölyem vardı. Öteboyutu boş bir tuval olarak tahayyül eder etmez içimi tarifsiz bir his kapladı. Fırçayı hareket ettirdikçe kendi tablomun daha da ayrıntılarına indim. Paletimin canlı renklerinin arasında saklı duran görüler vardı. İçten içe bunlardan hangilerini öne çıkarıp hangilerini ardımda bırakmam gerektiğini biliyordum. Birkaç gün sonra kendime geldiğimde seyahat tamamlanmıştı."
languages.original_text: "But everything changed when I found my own key to this mystery. You see, I've always brightened up my rare moments of leisure time by painting — you may recall there was a workshop in my chambers. As soon as I imagined the warp as a blank canvas, an indescribable feeling came over me... I moved the brush, going deeper and deeper into my own painting. Visions were hidden within the vibrant colours of my palette, and something inside me knew which should be brought out and which should be left behind. I woke up several days later, after the voyage was safely complete."

traits.locale_text: "Bu gizeme kendi yaklaşımımı keşfedince işler değişti. Şöyle ki, nadiren de olsa boş vaktim olduğunda ressamlığa soyunmuşumdur hep... Hatırlarsan odamda bir atölyem vardı. Öteboyutu boş bir tuval şeklinde hayal eder etmez içimi tasvir edemeyeceğim bir his kapladı... Fırçayı hareket ettirdikçe kendi tablomun daha da derinliklerine indim. Paletimin canlı renklerinin arasında saklı duran görüler vardı. İçten içe bunlardan hangilerini öne çıkarıp hangilerini ardımda bırakmam gerektiğini biliyordum. Birkaç gün sonra kendime geldiğimde seyahat tamamlanmıştı."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
